name: StyleXplorers.com
tag_list: online-community, lifestyle-magazine, social-community, social-society, research, marketing, branding, advertising
overview:
Brands Beyond Borders is a global creative marketing and branding agency with offices in the US and Europe. The agency combines the expertise of international marketing professionals with experience in traditional and non-traditional techniques including; research, advertising, promotions, branding, social marketing, and cause marketing. Brands Beyond Borders helps clients transcend traditional boundaries, languages and other impediments while providing designers, manufacturers, service providers, retailers, and merchants with the services and resources needed for global success.

Powering Brands Beyond Borders from a consumer market research, and market data clustering standpoint is StyleXplorers.com, a global lifestyle magazine, social community and network. StyleXplorers.com is a new global gathering place for people who are passionate about their lifestyle; brands, products, activities, music, destinations, services, and so much more. www.stylexplorers.com is a worldwise lifestyle magazine where trend-setting individuals (upper-middle to upper income 20, 30 & 40 somethings) from across the globe meet to exchange opinions about whatâ€™s hot, whatâ€™s not, and whatâ€™s next.
